name: Work Media
description:
Search Engine Optimization & Pay Per Click Management Company. Work Media is a Nashville SEO and search engine marketing firm founded by the Work brothers, Jerry and Chris, in 2006. Jerry and Chris started doing web site design over a decade ago and have done just about everything there is to do involving a web site. Chris is one of the top experts in the country in law firm web site promotion, having successfully promoted dozens of them.
Jerry's experience is a bit broader, having once been Manager of Search for one of the nation's largest television home shopping networks. Our office is located at 98 West College Street in historic downtown Dickson, Tennessee.
READ MORE...
